The absorption speed The concept of the glycemic index (GI) has gained considerable attention in recent years, as individuals strive to make informed dietary choices to optimize their health and well-being. From its influence on athletic performance to its impact on fat loss, health, and sugar consumption, understanding the glycemic index can empower individuals to make informed dietary decisions.
